SEARCH
Package gw.currency.fxrate

Interface FXRateService

public interface FXRateService
Interface for the Exchange Rate Service

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description

  • Method Details

    • getFXRate

      FXRate getFXRate(FXRateContext requestContext)
      Returns the FXRate obtained and returned by the service.
      Parameters:
      requestContext - the requested FXRateContext which contains the currencies, market and requested time required for the service to obtain and return a FXRate
      Returns:
      the FXRate obtained and returned by the service

    • allConfiguredMarkets

      Set<FXRateMarket> allConfiguredMarkets()
      Returns a Set of FXRateMarkets which are configured for this system.
      Returns:
      a Set of FXRateMarkets which are configured for this system

    • allConfiguredCurrencies

      Set<Currency> allConfiguredCurrencies()
      Returns a Set of all currencies for all markets
      Returns:
      a Set of all currencies for all markets

    • findConfiguredCurrencies

      Set<Currency> findConfiguredCurrencies(FXRateMarket market)
      Returns a Set of all currencies for the given market
      Parameters:
      market - the FXRateMarket for which to find currencies
      Returns:
      a Set of all currencies for the given market

    • findAvailableConversions

      Set<Pair<Currency,Currency>> findAvailableConversions(FXRateMarket market, Currency currency)
      Returns a set of the conversions to or from the given Currency which are available from the given FXRateMarket
      Parameters:
      market - the FXRateMarket
      currency - the Currency to include in the search for available conversions
      Returns:
      a set of the conversions to or from the given Currency which are available from the given FXRateMarket

    • canConvert

      boolean canConvert(Currency fromCurrency, Currency toCurrency)
      Returns true if it is possible to convert using this pair of currencies
      Parameters:
      fromCurrency - the Currency to convert from
      toCurrency - the Currency to convert to
      Returns:
      whether it is possible to convert using this pair of currencies

    • findAvailableMarkets

      Set<FXRateMarket> findAvailableMarkets(Currency fromCurrency, Currency toCurrency)
      Return a set of Markets that can convert using the given pair of currencies
      Parameters:
      fromCurrency - the Currency to convert from
      toCurrency - the Currency to convert to
      Returns:
      a set of Markets that can convert using the given pair of currencies

    • findMarketTime

      Date findMarketTime(Currency fromCurrency, Currency toCurrency, FXRateMarket market, Date requestedTime)
      Returns the actual time used by the FXRateMarket for the given parameters
      Parameters:
      fromCurrency - the Currency to convert from
      toCurrency - the Currency to convert to
      market - the given FXRateMarket
      requestedTime - the time being requested
      Returns:
      the actual time used by the FXRateMarket

    • findNextMarketUpdateTime

      Date findNextMarketUpdateTime(Currency fromCurrency, Currency toCurrency, FXRateMarket market, Date afterTime)
      Returns the next time after the given afterTime that the market might have new rates available for the given currencies
      Parameters:
      fromCurrency - the Currency to convert from
      toCurrency - the Currency to convert to
      market - the given FXRateMarket
      afterTime - the cutoff time
      Returns:
      the next time this market might have new rates available

    • getMarketName

      String getMarketName(FXRateMarket market)
      The name of the market
      Parameters:
      market - the FXRateMarket
      Returns:
      the market's name

    • getMarketDescription

      String getMarketDescription(FXRateMarket market)
      The description of the market
      Parameters:
      market - the FXRateMarket
      Returns:
      the market's description

    • findEarliestAvailableRateDate

      Date findEarliestAvailableRateDate(FXRateMarket market)
      Returns the earliest available market rate date
      Parameters:
      market - the FXRateMarket
      Returns:
      the earliest available rate date for the given market

    • findLatestAvailableRateDate

      Date findLatestAvailableRateDate(FXRateMarket market)
      Returns the latest available market rate date, which may be in the future
      Parameters:
      market - the FXRateMarket
      Returns:
      the latest available market rate date, which may be in the future
